metadata.amazon:note: The Rabbit map client uses the exact name of this layer to place the route line underneath map labels. Changing the name or removing the layer will cause the TBT routeline to render on top of all layers, including road names and shields.

metadata.maputnik:comment: layer name is hardcoded in Amazon app; do not change it!
